title: Beachfront Property Close To Galle - LIP 046
details: LIP-046 Close to Galle fort and comprising of 720 Perches, this stunning property offers spectacular sea views. The property is fairly flat which offers great development potential for a beach front hotel resort or private villa development or an exclusive gated community with all amenities and an investors private clubhouse. With a natural reef around the beach area, making this the ideal beach for safe swimming. Galle Fort is extremely popular with foreign investors and is only 10 minutes’ drive away. The property has a good access road with restaurants, shops and places of interest in close proximity.
